data.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Specs & Speed
data.meta_description: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge: 5.1-inch (2560x1440), 16 MP Camera, 2600 mAh, Exynos 7420 Processor (3 GB)
data.text:
5.1" (2560x1440) Super AMOLED

3GB

Exynos 7420 SoC 32GB/64GB/128GB Storage

16-MP, f/1.9, OIS 1 Rear Camera

2600 mAh W-Charge

The Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge phone has a 5.1-inch (2560x1440) Super AMOLED screen, a 16MP main camera and a 5MP selfie camera. The battery capacity is 2600 mAh and the main processor is a Exynos 7420 with 3 GB of RAM.

Galaxy S6 Edge Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

+

What is the price of Galaxy S6 Edge?

The last time we checked, the Galaxy S6 Edge was retailing at around $535 online. Things may have changed a bit since.

+

Is the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge waterproof?

No. Our information shows that the Galaxy S6 Edge is NOT water-resistant an has no IP-Rating rating.

+

Is the Galaxy S6 Edge Dual-SIM?

No, the Galaxy S6 Edge does not have dual-SIMs as far as we know, but things may be different in Asia. We mostly track USA data.

+

Is the Galaxy S6 Edge 4K?

No, the Galaxy S6 Edge resolution of (2560x1440) is not considered to be 4K.

+

Does the Galaxy S6 Edge feature Wireless Charging?

Yes, the Galaxy S6 Edge supports Wireless Charging.

+

Does Galaxy S6 Edge have Qi Wireless Charging?

Yes, the Galaxy S6 Edge features Qi Wireless Charging.

+

Is the Galaxy S6 Edge 4G-compatible?

Yes, the Galaxy S6 Edge is a 4G device that is rated 4G LTE CAT6 (301 Mbps).

+

Is the Galaxy S6 Edge 5G?

No, the Galaxy S6 Edge does not work on 5G NR networks.

+

Does the Galaxy S6 Edge have a USB-C connector?

No, the Galaxy S6 Edge does not have a USB-C connector.

+

Does the Galaxy S6 Edge have a removable battery?

No, the Galaxy S6 Edge does not have a removable battery.
